gist.headline: Fresh crayons
gist.blurb: Coloring Me has joined the showcase. It's a free mobile app for generating interactive coloring pages, because sometimes you just need to stay inside the lines.
gist.summary: Added 'Coloring Me', a mobile-friendly app for generating interactive coloring pages, to the Creative showcase.
gist.impact: Users can now discover a new free tool for generating custom coloring activities directly from the apps list.
gist.visual_concept: The concept focuses on the act of coloring and creativity. The key symbols are a digital tablet/coloring book and a large pixel crayon. The scene depicts Polly the Bee actively coloring in a line-art flower, bridging the gap between AI generation and human creativity.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot holding a large pixel crayon, coloring in a line-art flower on a tablet screen. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky pixels, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Playful and creative vibes.
